About me

Greetings! I'm R S Kierthana, a dedicated B.Tech IT student on an exciting odyssey of learning and innovation. In the crucible of academia, I am honing a diverse skill set that forms the foundation of my technological aspirations.

Outside the academic corridors, I'm a creator at heart. I channel my creativity into amazing projects, weaving stories through code and bringing concepts to life.Whether it's crafting poems and stories, drawing intricate zentangle and doodle art, or engaging in a spirited game of badminton, I find inspiration in the diversity of creative expression. My journey is a harmonious blend of technology and artistic expression. Just as I create lines of code, I compose verses, draw intricate patterns, and enjoy the rhythm of a badminton rally.Aspirations extend beyond conventional boundaries, seeking a future where technology and creativity dance together, creating a symphony of innovation.Looking ahead, my goal is to continue pushing the boundaries of technology, exploring how it can be a catalyst for positive change.Whether it's through coding, creative projects, or collaborative ventures, my aim is to leave an indelible mark on the tech landscape.

View Resume

Projects

Hospital Managment System

I developed a Hospital Management System using Python, MySQLConnector, and PySimpleGUI. This project streamlined staff and patient data management through an intuitive interface. This experience enhanced my skills in Python programming, database integration, and user interface design.

Source Code

Wonder Whiz

I created an interactive quiz website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This project involved crafting engaging user interfaces with HTML and CSS and implementing dynamic quiz functionalities with JavaScript. Users can participate in quizzes, answer questions, and receive instant feedback.

See Live Source Code

Wanderlust Ways

I designed and developed a comprehensive Travel Planning Website utilizing HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, and MySQL. This multifaceted platform empowers users to add and organize travel plans seamlessly. Through the integration of PHP and MySQL, users can create detailed travel itineraries, including travel arrangements, real-time weather updates, accommodation options, and a day-by-day guide to explore attractions.

See Live Source Code
